events.name: ReportGenerated
events.description: Triggered when an analytics report is successfully generated.

events.name: ReportViewed
events.description: Happens when a user views a generated report.

events.name: ReportScheduled
events.description: Occurs when a report is scheduled for future generation.

events.name: ReportDelivered
events.description: Triggered when a report is delivered to a user.

commands.name: GenerateReport
commands.description: Triggered when an analytics report is successfully generated.

commands.name: ViewReport
commands.description: Happens when a user views a generated report.

commands.name: ScheduleReport
commands.description: Occurs when a report is scheduled for future generation.

commands.name: DeliverReport
commands.description: Triggered when a report is delivered to a user.

integrationPoints.name: UserManagement
integrationPoints.description: To integrate user authentication and access control for viewing reports.

integrationPoints.name: DataWarehouse
integrationPoints.description: Integration for pulling raw data needed for report generation.

integrationPoints.name: NotificationService
integrationPoints.description: To notify users about report status (e.g., generated, scheduled, delivered).
